answers.author: Stewart Fairburn
answers.text:
Mustang Oklahoma has a campus like approach. They have a separate city hall in a park, and right next to the city hall is a building that houses the library, senior citizen section, a conference style rental room and a gym.  Another city hall I remember was one half library and the other half city hall.

answers.text:
One key characteristic I think of is separately accessible meeting rooms.  Community meetings take place after work hours.  The design should include easy (ADA) access to the meeting areas, without access to city hall.

author: Gregory Stopka
text:
I have a member looking to build a new city hall.  They are interested in learning about incorporating ideas to make the city hall more of a community center.   Outside of providing traditional city services, they want to include elements of what would normally be in a community center.  He's interested in hearing ideas on how others have done that.
Thanks,
Greg Stopka
Central Regional Director
Alliance for Innovation
title: Building City Hall as a Community Center
